products.facts: ["Organic Cinnamon Harvest - 462g is made from 100% organic cinnamon sourced from sustainable farms.","The product is packaged in eco-friendly materials to minimize environmental impact.","This cinnamon is free from synthetic pesticides and fertilizers, promoting healthier soil and ecosystems.","Quality is ensured through rigorous testing for purity and flavor, making it suitable for culinary and health uses."]

products.name: Earth Balance Original/Traditional Spread

products.facts: ["Earth Balance Original/Traditional Spread is made from a blend of plant-based oils, including palm fruit oil and canola oil.","The product is non-GMO and free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring a natural quality.","Earth Balance is committed to sustainable palm oil sourcing, contributing to ecological preservation.","The spread is vegan, containing no dairy or animal products, aligning with environmentally friendly dietary choices."]
